description.english: Do not kill any archers inside the dream.
description.german: Töte keine Schützen innerhalb des Traums.
description.french: Ne pas tuer d'archers dans le rêve.
description.italian: Non uccidere arcieri dentro al sogno.
description.spanish: No mates ningún arquero dentro del sueño.
description.russian: Не убить во сне ни одного лучника.

description.english: Finishing the dream.
description.german: Beende den Traum.
description.french: Terminer le rêve.
description.italian: Completa il sogno.
description.spanish: Termina el sueño.

description.english: Kill all the soldiers in a level without using gunpowder.
description.german: Töte alle Soldaten eines Levels mit Schießpulver.
description.french: Tuer tous les soldats d'un niveau sans utiliser de poudre.
description.italian: Uccidi i soldati di un livello senza usare la polvere da sparo.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los soldados en un nivel sin usar pólvora.
description.russian: Убить всех воинов на уровне, не пользуясь порохом.

description.english: Kill the ogre with your sword.
description.german: Töte den Oger mit deinem Schwert.
description.french: Tuer l'ogre avec votre épée.
description.italian: Uccidi l'orco usando la spada.
description.spanish: Mata el ogro con tu espada.

description.english: Defeat Murdock without using any torches.
description.german: Besiege Murdock, ohne eine Fackel einzusetzen.
description.french: Battre Murdock sans utiliser de torches.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Murdock senza usare torce.
description.spanish: Derrota a Murdock sin usar ninguna antorcha.

description.english: Defeat Murdock The Revenant without using chandeliers.
description.german: Besiege Murdock den Rückkehrer ohne die Leuchter einzusetzen.
description.french: Battre Murdock le Revenant sans utiliser de lustres.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Murdock il Ritornante senza usare lampadari.
description.spanish: Derrota a Murdock El Renacido sin usar candelabros.
description.russian: Победить Неупокоенного Мурдока без помощи люстр.

description.english: Defeat Both phases of Murdock.
description.german: Besiege Murdock in beiden Phasen.
description.french: Battre les deux phases de Murdock.
description.italian: Sconfiggi entrambe le fasi di Murdock.
description.spanish: Derrota ambas fases de Murdock.

description.english: Feed the snake to the crocodile.
description.german: Verfüttere die Schlange an das Krokodil.
description.french: Donner le serpent à manger au crocodile.
description.italian: Dai da mangiare il serpente al coccodrillo.
description.spanish: Alimenta al cocodrilo con la serpiente.

description.english: Destroy the boulder with the pickaxe.
description.german: Zerstöre den Felsbrocken mit der Spitzhacke.
description.french: Détruire le rocher avec la pioche.
description.italian: Distruggi il macigno con il piccone.
description.spanish: Destruye la roca con la pica.

description.english: Defeat algernon.
description.german: Besiege Algernon.
description.french: Battre Algernon.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Algernon.
description.spanish: Derrota a Algernon.

displayName.english: I thought I taw a puddy tat
displayName.german: Ich wünsch mir eine kleine Miezekatze
displayName.french: Je crois que j'ai vu un gros minet
displayName.spanish: Creo que he visto un dindo gatito

description.english: Build the cage and lock Masamba.
description.german: Baue den Käfig und sperre Masamba ein.
description.french: Construire la cage et enfermer Masamba.
description.italian: Costruisci la gabbia e intrappola Masamba.
description.spanish: Construye la jaula y encierra a Masamba.
description.russian: Построить клетку и посадить Масамбу под замок.

description.english: Enter the caves.
description.german: Betritt die Höhle.
description.french: Entrer dans les cavernes.
description.italian: Entra nelle caverne.
description.spanish: Entra a las cuevas.

description.english: Defeat the goblins.
description.german: Besiege die Goblins.
description.french: Battre les gobelins.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i goblin.
description.spanish: Derrota a los goblins.

displayName.english: A pinch of this, some drops of that...
displayName.german: Eine Prise hiervon, ein paar Tropfen davon ...
displayName.french: Un peu de ci, un peu de ça
displayName.italian: Un po' di questo, due gocce di quello...
displayName.spanish: Una pizca de esto, unas gotas de lo otro

description.english: Find all the ways to poison the jester.
description.german: Finde alle Wege, um den Hofnarren zu vergiften.
description.french: Trouver tous les moyens d'empoisonner le Fou.
description.italian: Scopri tutti i modi per avvelenare il giullare.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las formas de envenenar al Bufón.

description.english: Get all the items of the highborn outfit.
description.german: Sammle alle Teile des „Hochwohlgeborenen“-Outfits.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les pièces de la tenue de noble.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli elementi del completo da nobile.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los items del traje de realeza.

description.english: Survive Witter's boss fight.
description.german: Überstehe Witters Bosskampf.
description.french: Survivre au combat contre Witter.
description.italian: Sopravvivi allo scontro con Witter.
description.spanish: Sobrevive la pelea contra Witter.

description.english: Kill the three bandits with only 1 machine.
description.german: Töte die drei Banditen mit nur 1 Maschine.
description.french: Tuer les trois bandits avec une seule machine.
description.italian: Uccidi 3 banditi con una sola macchina.
description.spanish: Mata a tres bandidos con una máquina.
description.russian: Убить трех бандитов с помощью одной машины.

description.english: Push Ice to fire to melt it.
description.german: Schiebe Eis zum Feuer, um es zu schmelzen.
description.french: Pousser la glace dans le feu pour la faire fondre.
description.italian: Spingi il ghiaccio nel fuoco per scioglierlo.
description.spanish: Empuja el hielo al fuego para derretirlo.
description.russian: Столкнуть лед в огонь, чтобы растопить его.

description.english: Get all the color combinations to the outfit.
description.german: Erhalte alle Farbkombinationen zum Outfit.
description.french: Obtenir toutes les combinaisons de couleurs pour le costume.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le combinazioni cromatiche del completo.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las combinaciones de color para el traje.
description.russian: Собрать все возможные сочетания цветов в костюме.

displayName.english: I think its better for us to split
displayName.german: Es wäre besser, wenn wir uns aufteilen
displayName.spanish: Creo que es mejor que nos separemos

description.english: Kill 20 guards using the wand.
description.german: Töte 20 Wachen mit dem Zauberstab.
description.french: Tuer 20 gardes avec la baguette.
description.italian: Uccidi 20 guardie usando la bacchetta.
description.spanish: Mata a 20 guardias usando la varita.

description.english: Kill the guard using the portcullis.
description.german: Töte die Wache mithilfe von Fallgittern.
description.french: Tuer le garde avec la herse.
description.italian: Uccidi la guardia usando le saracinesche
description.spanish: Mata el guardia usando el portón.

description.english: Survive the first fight against the snake without taking damage.
description.german: Überlebe den ersten Kampf gegen die Schlange, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Survivre au premier combat contre le Serpent sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Sopravvivi al primo scontro con il serpente senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Sobrevive la primera pelea contra Snake sin sufrir daños.
description.russian: Пережить первый бой со Змеем, избежав ран.

description.english: Don't kill any shadow clone.
description.german: Töte keine Schattenklone.
description.french: Ne tuer aucun clone de l'ombre.
description.italian: Non uccidere nessun clone di ombra.
description.spanish: No mates ningún clón sombrío.

description.english: All nightmare long.
description.german: Überlebe den Albtraum.
description.french: Survivre au cauchemar.
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'incubo.
description.spanish: Sobrevive la pesadilla.

description.english: FInish the game.
description.german: Beende das Spiel.
description.french: Terminer le jeu.
description.italian: Completa il gioco.
description.spanish: Termina el juego.
